name: thermostat
description: ## Specification * Thermostat starts at 20 degrees * You can increase the temperature with an up function * You can decrease the temperature with a down function * The minimum temperature is 10 degrees * If power saving mode is on, the maximum temperature is 25 degrees * If power saving mode is off, the maximum temperature is 32 degrees * Power saving mode is on by default * You can reset the temperature to 20 with a reset function * You can ask about the thermostat's current energy usage: < 18 is low-usage, < 25 is medium-usage, anything else is high-usage.
author: Esam Al-Dabagh
